entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
